question: 刃先
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>blade</kanji>'s <kanji>ahead</kanji> is the farthest part of the blade away from you (since it's ahead of you). This is the <vocabulary>edge of the blade</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>blade edge</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. For <ja>刃</ja> you learned that with the kanji. For <ja>先</ja> that's the vocab version of the kanji.
